item.title: Learning in Public
item.description: The Wrong Approach I’ve spent the last several years trying to learn as much as possible and put it all together into one big project that I could share with the people. But as I’m reading one book, I find that it leads to a dozen more, and I start reading those books - and all the books they reference while I’m still reading through the original book that piqued my interest.
